creator: April7 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
DaTalk is a fun way to connect with new and interesting people around you. If someone talks to you, it’s a match! Chat with your matches and get to know them inside of DaTalk.

DaTalk is private messaging. Message new friends with photos and more - 1:1. - all private.

Make friends who are close to you.
Over a million members, and we are happy to have people like you.
Most popular one-on-one chat in Appstore.

DaTalk does not require any personal information except for your nickname and age.

DaTalk provides simple yet honest and deep conversation via anonymous system.

Send "points" to people who interest you. Show your affection!
Start with safe and easy chatting.

DaTalk is FREE. Download now!

_

※ Choice access required when using the App
✓ READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : This is the privilege you need to provide the ability to select pictures from your album when uploading your pictures.
✓ CAMERA, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : This permission is required to provide the ability to use the camera to take pictures of your photos when uploading them.

- You can use the app without agreeing to the option access authority.
descriptionShort: Searching for friends & lovers. You won't be lonely anymore.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: • Bug fixes and improvements

rated.label: PEGI 18

title: DaTalk - Random Chat Room

creator: April7 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
DaTalk is a fun way to connect with new and interesting people around you. If someone talks to you, it’s a match! Chat with your matches and get to know them inside of DaTalk.
DaTalk is private messaging. Message new friends with photos and more - 1:1. - all private.
Make friends who are close to you.
Over a million members, and we are happy to have people like you.
Most popular one-on-one chat in Appstore.
DaTalk does not require any personal information except for your nickname and age.
DaTalk provides simple yet honest and deep conversation via anonymous system.
Send “points” to people who interest you. Show your affection!
Start with safe and easy chatting.
Download now!

- You can use the app without agreeing to the option access authority.

creator: April7 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
DaTalk is a fun way to connect with new and interesting people around you. When someone talks to you, it's a match!

Chat with your matches and get to know them inside DaTalk. DaTalk is private messaging. Chat with new friends, exchange photos, and more - all privately, one-on-one. Make friends who are geographically close to you.

With over 18 million cumulative members, we welcome people like you. DaTalk is the most popular one-on-one chat app on Play Store.

DaTalk doesn't require any personal information except for your nickname and age. It provides straightforward yet honest and deep conversations through an anonymous system. Send "points" to those who interest you and express your affection.

Begin your safe and easy chat today. Download now!
descriptionShort: Find Friends and Lovers! You'll Never Feel Lonely Again.

appDetails.developerAddress: B204/B225, 374 Gangnam-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea 06241
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Check out the new and convenient features in our latest update!

- Now, you can pin your favorite chat rooms at the top! Just press and hold the chat room you want to pin. Easy to find, anytime.
- With new messages, you can jump straight to the latest ones. Don't miss out on any conversation, stay updated in a snap!

This update is going to make DaTalk more enjoyable and user-friendly! Dive in and make the most of it!

title:
DaTalk - Chat Connect Randomly
2.0.12

container.value: B204/B225, 374 Gangnam-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea 06241

creator: April7 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Discover Diversity, Accept Differences – DaTalk
Your Gateway to Global Connections!

Introducing DaTalk, an exciting way to connect with new people around the world.

Already, 18 million people globally have experienced DaTalk, and using it is incredibly simple. From your friends list, you can find and chat 1-on-1 with strangers, sharing photos and having personal conversations to get to know each other better. You might bond over common hobbies or life experiences, and perhaps even find your soulmate. With only nicknames and ages displayed, you can interact freely without preconceptions.

One of DaTalk's powerful features is the ability to connect locally with people nearby, or globally with friends from the US, Japan, Europe and more. In a safe, trusted environment, you can make new connections across cultures and outlooks, enjoying diverse conversations.

Download DaTalk today and start meeting new friends worldwide.

* Must be 19 or older to use
descriptionShort: Chat and make global friends from around the world. Connect across cultures.

appDetails.developerAddress: B204/B225, 374 Gangnam-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea 06241
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- App performance improvements
- Dark mode support

We have updated DaTalk to reflect the valuable opinions of our members. We are always listening to your feedback and will do our best to actively incorporate your suggestions whenever possible. Thank you for using DaTalk.

title:
DaTalk - Chat Connect Globally
2.0.22

container.value: B204/B225, 374 Gangnam-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea 06241

creator: April7 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
DaTalk is an anonymous chat app designed to help you connect with local friends nearby in a simple and effortless way. Whether you're looking to chat casually or hoping to form a meaningful connection, DaTalk offers endless opportunities, even the chance for a special date or meeting.

With only your nickname and age displayed, you can enjoy chatting and conversations safely and without judgment. Browse through the list of potential friends in your area, start 1:1 chats, and share photos to get to know each other better.

DaTalk emphasizes natural interactions with local users, making it easy to meet nearby friends in your area. While the app is focused on local connections, it also enables you to connect globally. With DaTalk’s powerful real-time translation feature, you can chat with people from the US, Japan, Europe, and beyond, breaking barriers of language and distance.

Use DaTalk to chat effortlessly and meet new local friends, and maybe even form a meaningful connection or go on a date! Enjoy the freedom and honesty that anonymous chatting brings while building genuine relationships.

Download DaTalk now and start your journey toward exciting new connections and special moments in a safe and trustworthy environment!

*Available for users aged 19 and older.
descriptionShort: Casually chat with anonymous friends nearby.

appDetails.developerAddress: B204/B225, 374 Gangnam-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea 06241
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved app performance

We've released a new version of DaTalk, reflecting your valuable feedback. Thank you for your continued support and love!

DaTalk emphasizes natural interactions with local users, making it easy to meet nearby friends in your area. While the app is focused on local connections, it also enables you to connect globally. With DaTalk’s powerful real-time translation feature, you can chat with people from the US, Japan, Europe, and beyond, breaking barriers of language and distance.

Use DaTalk to chat effortlessly and meet new local friends, and maybe even form a meaningful connection or go on a date! Enjoy the freedom and honesty that anonymous chatting brings while building genuine relationships.

Download DaTalk now and start your journey toward exciting new connections and special moments in a safe and trustworthy environment!

*Available for users aged 19 and older.
descriptionShort: Casually chat with anonymous friends nearby.
